data.title: Fort Worth, Texas Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Fort Worth, Texas with information about Fort Worth, Texas official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Fort Worth, Texas is officially in the Central Time Zone

The Current Time in

Fort Worth, Texas is:

Wednesday

8/28/2024

6:14 PM

CDT

Fort Worth, Texas

is in the

Central Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Central Standard Time - is abbreviated as CST

Central Daylight Time - is abbreviated as CDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Fort Worth, Texas is GMT/UTC - 6h during Standard Time

Fort Worth, Texas is GMT/UTC - 5h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Fort Worth, Texas starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
